alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 12 at 11:54AM MST until October 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19-22 degrees expected. * WHERE...The Grand Canyon above 6000 feet, including along the Colorado River and Phantom Ranch. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
